title.rendered: Yearbook Information for the Class of 2026

content.rendered:
Class of 2026 – Attention Rising Seniors & Parents!
Please NOTE:  Below is a list of VERY Important Yearbook Information & Dates for the 2026 Yearbook.
Adirondack School Portraits (518) 792-6955
Senior Portraits-FREE of charge for a basic sitting
  • Monday, July 7th – Friday, July 11th, 2025
  • Last Call shoot at school (just a basic photo) Friday, September 5th, 2025

(Adirondack School Portraits will then send your portrait submission to the school)

If you are NOT using our host company, Adirondack School Portraits,
Senior Portraits are Due: Wednesday, October 8, 2025
  • Portrait requirements: 2×3, formal pose, no reclining poses or props!
  • We do recommend face shots as opposed to full body shots.
  • Please submit digitally via email to:  l_redman@saratogaschools.org
 
OTHER IMPORTANT DUE DATES:
  • Pre-SALE $60 yearbooks.  www.jostensyearbooks.com  Pre-Sale closes Friday, December 5, 2025
  • Baby Pictures Due Friday, December 12, 2025
  • Senior Ads/Messages From Home $50 and up, Due Friday, January 16, 2025
COURTESY REMINDERS WILL BE SENT VIA PARENT SQUARE.
Questions? Email Mrs. Redman: l_redman@saratogaschools.org
